question:
With reference to the upcoming ‘Udyanotsav’, consider the following statements:
  1. It is also known as ‘Festival of Garden’.
  2. It is celebrated in the Mughal Garden of Rashtrapati Bhavan.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Udyanotsav is an annual festival of garden celebrated in February to mark the onset of spring. It features various flowers like tulips, roses, hyacinths, Asiatic lilies, ranunculus, etc. for the public. This year’s celebration will also feature the ‘Grace de Monaco’ rose, planted last year by Prince Albert II of Monaco. Statement 2 is correct: The Udyanotsav festival is celebrated in the Mughal Gardens of Rashtrapati Bhavan. It is thrown open to public who will be able to access the herbal garden, spiritual garden and the bonsai garden. The gardens are located at the heart of the President’s Estate in Delhi.
